main event: A witness observed a round, white object moving swiftly in the sky while watching a dust devil in Glendale, Arizona on 1 May 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as round and the size of a quarter., The sighting lasted no more than 15 seconds., The object traveled in a straight path before fading from sight in a northeast direction., The witness believed it was not an aircraft, balloon, or any known astronomical body., The weather was clear with very good visibility at the time of the sighting.
witness description: male, age 38, described as a reliable observer
